UseCase.name: Use Case
UseCase.description: Viewpoint focused on the user and its use case. Displays the less technical data such as XXX

Understandability.name: Understandability
Understandability.description: Quality Dimension under the Use Case Viewpoint. Describes whether the dataset can easily be understood by potential users.

Contextuality.name: Contextuality
Contextuality.description: Context is provided to the user.

metric1.name: Keywords Presence
metric1.description: Keywords should be specified.

evaluationRule.description: Keywords are present.

metric1.name: Title.
metric1.description: Title

evaluationRule.description: Checks that the property is set.

metric1.name: Abstract.
metric1.description: Abstract.

evaluationRule.description: Checks that the property is set.

CurrentnessUC.name: Currentness (UC)
CurrentnessUC.description: Time frame of the dataset and relevant dates.

metric1.name: Date Of Creation (UC)
metric1.description: Date of creation

evaluationRule.description: Date of creation should be included in user requested period
Date of publication should be included in user requested period

metric3.name: Date Of Revision (UC)
metric3.description: Date of revision declared in the Metadata

evaluationRule.description: Date of last revision should be included in user requested period

Language.name: Language
Language.description: Quality Element under the Understandability Dimension. Evaluates language requirements (specification of language, English available..).

metric1.name: Resource Language
metric1.description: Language(s) used within the datasets.

evaluationRule.description: Resource Language is present

metric2.name: Metadata Language
metric2.description: Language in which the metadata elements are expressed

evaluationRule.description: Metadata language is present

metric1.name: English
metric1.description: Default language OR one of the alternate languages is English

evaluationRule.description: Default language of the Metadata OR one of its alternate languages is English

Relevance.name: Relevance
Relevance.description: Quality Dimension under the Use Case Viewpoint. Describes the relevance potential of the dataset for users.

ReferenceSystem.name: Reference System (relevance)
ReferenceSystem.description: Description of the reference system(s) used in the data set.

CoordinateReferenceSystem.name: Coordinate Reference System (relevance)
CoordinateReferenceSystem.description: Description of the coordinate reference system(s) used in the data set.

metric1.name: West Bound Longitude (relevance)
metric1.description: Parameter must be set

evaluationRule.description: Checks whether the dataset encompasses the right area according to user input.
Checks whether the dataset encompasses the right area according to user input.
Checks whether the dataset encompasses the right area according to user input.
Checks whether the dataset encompasses the right area according to user input.

ServiceAndDataset.name: Service And Dataset
ServiceAndDataset.description: Viewpoint focused on Service availability and technical evaluations. Use of ISO standards, Quality Evaluation Software and Metadata.

serviceQuality.name: Service Quality
serviceQuality.description: Dimension under the Service and Dataset Viewpoint. Evaluates the quality of the service that provides the data.

serviceRobustness.name: Service Robustness
serviceRobustness.description: Quality Element evaluating the service's robustness.

availability.name: Availability
availability.description: Displays availability statistics of the service.

metric1.name: Days Of Availability Metrics
metric1.description: For how many days availability statistics and interruptions are calculated

evaluationRule.description: Checks presence

metric2.name: Days Of Response Time Metrics
metric2.description: For how many days response time metrics are calculated

evaluationRule.description: Checks presence

metric3.name: Availability ok (ms)
metric3.description: Contains the number of milliseconds the service has been in 'ok' state during the period

evaluationRule.description: Check presence of measure

metric4.name: Availability down (ms)
metric4.description: Contains the number of milliseconds the service has been in 'ok' state during the period

evaluationRule.description: Check presence of measure

metric5.name: Availability maintenance (ms)
metric5.description: Contains the number of milliseconds the service has been in 'ok' state during the period

evaluationRule.description: Check presence of measure

metric6.name: Availability
metric6.description: Contains the number of milliseconds the service has been in available (meaning ok or in maintenance state) during the period

evaluationRule.description: We assume the service should be available state at least 95% of the time from when the statistics are calculated. Availability = (ok + maintenance) / (ok + down + maintenance)

metric7.name: Longest Interruptions
metric7.description: The length in milliseconds of the longest interruption during or overlapping 'daysOfAvailabilityMetrics'

evaluationRule.description: We assume it should be at most 24h. Null if no monitoring data is available for the period.

metric8.name: Average Interruptions
metric8.description: The average length of service interruptions during or overlapping 'daysOfAvailabilityMetrics'

evaluationRule.description: We assume it should be at most 12h. Null if no monitoring data is available for the period.

metric9.name: Response Time Average
metric9.description: Average response time (in milliseconds) of service during 'daysOfResponseTimeMetrics'.

evaluationRule.description: We assume it should be at most 6h. Null if no monitoring data is available for the period.

metric10.name: Response Time Latest At
metric10.description: Timestamp of latest monitoring request (in milliseconds since epoch).

evaluationRule.description: Check presence of timestamp. Null if no monitoring data is available for the period.

metric11.name: Response Time Latest Millis
metric11.description: Response time (in milliseconds) of the latest monitoring request.

evaluationRule.description: We assume it should be at most 1h. Null if no monitoring data is available for the period.

metric12.name: Service Info Url
metric12.description: URL of the service endpoint in question

evaluationRule.description: Check presence of URL.

metric13.name: Service Info Type
metric13.description: Type of service (WMS, WFS, WMTS, ArcGIS, REST, or INSPIRE_ATOM)

evaluationRule.description: Check presence of type of service.

metric14.name: Service Info Version
metric14.description: Version of service endpoint (newest supported version in case of OGC services

evaluationRule.description: Check presence of version.

completeness.name: Completeness
completeness.description: Presence and absence of features, their attributes and their relationship [ISO 19157-1:2021].

omission.name: Omission
omission.description: Data absent from the dataset, as described by the scope [ISO 19157-1:2021].

missingItem.name: Missing Item
missingItem.description: Evaluation based on missing items in the data.

metric1.name: Item Missing
metric1.description: Indication of omission

evaluationRule.description: Checks indication of omission
We assume it should be at most 1000 (number chosen randomly, user input parameter ?).
We assume it should be at most 15% (user input parameter ?).

commision.name: Comission
commision.description: Excess data present in the dataset, as described by the scope [ISO 19157-1:2021].

itemDucplicate.name: Item Duplicate
itemDucplicate.description: Evaluation based on duplicate items in the data.

metric1.name: Item Duplicate
metric1.description: Number of duplicate item

evaluationRule.description: We assume it should be at most 100 (number chosen randomly, user input parameter ?).

itemExcess.name: Item Excess
itemExcess.description: Evaluation based on excess items in the data.

metric1.name: Item Excess
metric1.description: Indication of commission

evaluationRule.description: Check presence of indication of excess item.
We assume it should be at most 100 (number chosen randomly, user input parameter ?).
We assume it should be at most 15% (user input parameter ?).

thematicQuality.name: Thematic Quality
thematicQuality.description: Thematic quality is defined as the accuracy of quantitative attributes and the correctness of non-quantitative attributes and of the classifications of features and their relationships [ISO 19157-1:2021].

quantitativeAttributeAccuracy.name: Quantitative Attribute Accuracy
quantitativeAttributeAccuracy.description: Closeness of the value of a quantitative attribute to a value accepted as or known to be true [ISO 19157-1:2021].

dateLastEvalQAA.name: Date Last Evaluation (QAA)
dateLastEvalQAA.description: Evaluation based on the date of last Evaluation.

metric1.name: Date Last Evaluation (QAA)
metric1.description: Date of last evaluation

evaluationRule.description: Should be between 2000-01-01 and 2023-01-01 (defined by user)

AVU68.name: AVU 68.3%
AVU68.description: Attribute value uncertainty at 68,3 % significance level

evaluationRule.description: Half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value for the quantitative attribute lies with probability 68,3 % ; LE68.3 (ISO19157, Table D.78)

AVU95.name: AVU 95%
AVU95.description: Attribute value uncertainty at 95 % significance level

evaluationRule.description: Half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value for the quantitative attribute lies with probability 95 % ; LE95 (ISO19157, Table D.81)

NonQuantitativeAttributeCorrectness.name: Non Quantitative Attribute Correctness
NonQuantitativeAttributeCorrectness.description: Correctness of non-quantitative attributes is correct or incorrect [ISO 19157-1:2021].

dateLastEvalNQAC.name: Date Last Evaluation (NQAC)
dateLastEvalNQAC.description: Evaluation based on the date of last Evaluation.

metric1.name: Date Last Evaluation (NQAC)
metric1.description: Date of last evaluation

evaluationRule.description: Should be between 2000-01-01 and 2023-01-01 (defined by user)

missclassNQAC.name: Missclassification (NQAC)
missclassNQAC.description: Evaluation based on the missclassification of non-quantitative attributes.

metric1.name: Missclassification Rate (NQAC)
metric1.description: Proportion of missclassification for non-quantitative attributes

evaluationRule.description: We assume it should be at most 15% (user input parameter ?).
We assume it should be at most 100 (number chosen randomly, user input parameter ?).

ClassificationCorrectness.name: Classification Correctness
ClassificationCorrectness.description: Comparison of the classes assigned to features or their attributes to a universe of discourse [ISO 19157-1:2021].

dateLastEvalThematicQuality.name: Date Last Evaluation Thematic Quality
dateLastEvalThematicQuality.description: Evaluation based on the date of last Evaluation.

metric1.name: Date Last Evaluation Thematic Quality
metric1.description: Date of last Evaluation.

evaluationRule.description: Should be between 2000-01-01 and 2023-01-01 (defined by user)

metric1.name: Missclassification Rate (TCC)
metric1.description: Proportion of incorrectly classified item

evaluationRule.description: We assume it should be at most 15% (user input parameter ?).

metric2.name: Number of Incorrect Items (TCC)
metric2.description: Number of item with incorrect classification

evaluationRule.description: We assume it should be at most 100 (number chosen randomly, user input parameter ?).

logicalConsistency.name: Logical Consistency
logicalConsistency.description: Degree of adherence to logical rules of data structure, attribution and relationships (data structure can be conceptual, logical or physical) [ISO 19157-1:2021].

ConceptualConsistency.name: Conceptual Consistency
ConceptualConsistency.description: Adherence to rules of the conceptual schema [ISO 19157-1:2021].

FailsOGC.name: FailsOGC
FailsOGC.description: Evaluation based on whether the data follows OGC principles.

metric1.name: Fails OGC Valid
metric1.description: The feature must follow OGC Valid principles.

evaluationRule.description: The feature do not follow OGC Valid principles. Checks count of such errors.

metric2.name: Fails OGC Simple
metric2.description: The feature must follow OGC Simple principles.

evaluationRule.description: The feature do not follow OGC Simple principles. Checks count of such errors.

MissingVertexNormals.name: Missing Vertex Normals
MissingVertexNormals.description: Evaluation based on whether the data is missing vertex normals.

metric1.name: MissingVertexNormals
metric1.description: The feature must have a vertex normals.

evaluationRule.description: The feature has no vertex normals. Checks count of such errors.

SurfacesWronglyOriented.name: Surfaces Wrongly Oriented
SurfacesWronglyOriented.description: Evaluation based on whether the data has mistakes in the orientation of surfaces.

metric1.name: Surfaces Wrongly Oriented
metric1.description: All normals of the faces must be logically oriented.

evaluationRule.description: Is the every surface of the feature logically oriented based on vertex normals and depending on the feature type? Checks count of such errors.

DomainConsistency.name: Domain Consistency
DomainConsistency.description: Adherence of values to the value domains [ISO 19157-1:2021].

AttributeValueNotInAllowedRange.name: Attribute Value Not In Allowed Range
AttributeValueNotInAllowedRange.description: Describes whether the attribute value is within allowed range.

metric1.name: Attribute Value Not In Allowed Range : True or False
metric1.description: The value of the attribute XXX must be in the allowed range (A-N). Allowed ranges were derived from OGC CityGML Encoding Standard.

evaluationRule.description: At least X attribute(s) is/are not in allowed range. Checks count of such errors.

FormatConsistency.name: Format Consistency
FormatConsistency.description: Degree to which data are stored in accordance with the physical structure of the dataset, as described by the scope [ISO 19157-1:2021].

MismatchedDimensions.name: Mismatched Dimensions
MismatchedDimensions.description: Evaluates the presence of mismatched dimensions.

metric1.name: Mismatched Dimensions
metric1.description: Geometries must be either 2D or 3D, not both.

evaluationRule.description: Does the feature have a mixture of 2D and 3D parts? Checks count of such errors.

Not3D.name: Not 3D
Not3D.description: Describes whether the coordinate reference system is in 3D (as it should) or not.

metric1.name: Not 3D
metric1.description: The coordinate reference system must be 3D.

evaluationRule.description: Is the coordinate reference system 3D? Checks count of such errors.

WrongDataType.name: Wrong Data Type
WrongDataType.description: Desctibes whether the data type of attriute is valid.

metric1.name: Wrong Data Type
metric1.description: Data type of attribute information XXX must be valid.

evaluationRule.description: At least X attribute(s) has/have a wrong data type. Checks count of such errors.

GeometricConsistency.name: Geometric Consistency
GeometricConsistency.description: Refers to the property of a set of geometric objects or transformations that preserve their relative position or shape.

metric1.name: GroundOverlappingIn2D
metric1.description: Overlapping area of two features must be smaller than 5 % of their areas.

evaluationRule.description: Is the GroundSurface overlapping with the GroundSurface of another Building? ? Checks count of such errors.

DegenerateCorruptGeometries.name: Degenerate Corrupt Geometries
DegenerateCorruptGeometries.description: Describe whether the geometry of features is valid.

metric1.name: Degenerate Corrupt Geometries
metric1.description: The geometry must be valid.

evaluationRule.description: Does the geometry contain degenerated or corrupted geometries? Checks count of such errors.

metric1.name: Non Planar Surfaces
metric1.description: The face or BoundarySurface must be planar.

evaluationRule.description: Is the Face or BoundarySurface planar based on thickness or normal deviation? Checks count of such errors.

GroundHigherThanRoof.name: Ground Higher Than Roof
GroundHigherThanRoof.description: Describes errors due to incoherent heights of ground an roof in relation with each other.

metric1.name: MinGroundHigherThanMinRoof
metric1.description: The minimum height of the roof cannot be smaller than minimum height of the ground.

evaluationRule.description: Checks count of such errors.

metric2.name: Max Ground Higher Than Max Roof
metric2.description: The maximum height of the floor cannot be smaller than maximum height of the roof.

evaluationRule.description: Checks count of such errors.

FeatureHasSpikes.name: Feature Has Spikes
FeatureHasSpikes.description: Evaluation based on spikes in dataset that exceed tolerance.

metric1.name: Feature Has Spikes
metric1.description: The feature contains spikes, which angle or length exceeds the given tolerance.

evaluationRule.description: The feature cannot contain spikes less than X degrees and/or Y meters (user ?).

GeometryTooSmall.name: Geometry Too Small
GeometryTooSmall.description: Describes whether some geometry are too small.

metric1.name: Area Too Small
metric1.description: The area of the face must be at least X m.

evaluationRule.description: The area of the face must be at least X m (user request? / user parameter in FME)

metric2.name: Too Small Volume
metric2.description: The volume of the solid cannot be smaller than X m3.

evaluationRule.description: The volume of the solid must be greater than X m3. (user request? / user parameter in FME)

Orientation.name: Orientation
Orientation.description: Evaluation based on presence of inccorect orientation.

metric1.name: Incorrect Surface Orientation
metric1.description: The surface must have a valid orientation.

evaluationRule.description: The surfaces cannot have an incorrect orientation.

metric2.name: Incorrect Solid Orientation
metric2.description: The solid must have a valid orientation.

evaluationRule.description: The solids cannot have an incorrect orientation.

metric3.name: Incorrect Area Orientation
metric3.description: The areas must have a valid orientation.

evaluationRule.description: Do Areas, such as polygons, ellipses, and donuts, have an correct orientation? The area cannot have an incorrect orientation.

TopologicalConsistency.name: Topological Consistency
TopologicalConsistency.description: Correctness of the explicitly encoded topological characteristics of the dataset as described by the scope [ISO 19157-1:2021].

metric1.name: Count Missing Connections
metric1.description: The feature must be self-closure based on its starting and ending points.

evaluationRule.description: The feature is not self-closure.

InvalidSolidVoids.name: Invalid Solid Voids
InvalidSolidVoids.description: Describes whether the solid contains problems.

metric1.name: Count Invalid Solid Voids
metric1.description: The solid must be valid.

evaluationRule.description: The solid cannot contain problems.

InvalidSelfInterestOverlapErrors.name: Invalid Self-Interest Overlap Errors
InvalidSelfInterestOverlapErrors.description: Describes whether vertices of the feature are correctly connected.

metric1.name: Count Invalid Self-Interest Overlap Errors
metric1.description: The vertices of the feature must be correctly connected

evaluationRule.description: The feature cannot intersect itself.

InvalidSolidBoundaries.name: Invalid Solid Boundaries
InvalidSolidBoundaries.description: The solid boundaries must be valid.

metric1.name: Count Invalid Solid Boundaries
metric1.description: The solid boundaries must be valid.

evaluationRule.description: The solid boundaries cannot be invalid.

temporalQuality.name: Temporal Quality
temporalQuality.description: Accuracy of the temporal attributes and temporal relationships of features [ISO 19157-1:2021].

AccuracyTimeMeasurment.name: Accuracy Time Measurment
AccuracyTimeMeasurment.description: Closeness of reported time measurements to values accepted as true [ISO 19157-1:2021].

TimeAccuracy.name: Time Accuracy
TimeAccuracy.description: Time accuracy at XX.X % significance level [ISO 19157-3:2021]..

metric1.name: Time Accuracy LE90
metric1.description: Time accuracy at 90 % significance level

evaluationRule.description: Half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value for the time instance lies with probability 90 %; LE90 (ISO19157, Table D.63)

TemporalConsistency.name: Temporal Consistency
TemporalConsistency.description: Evaluates the correctness of the order of events [ISO 19157-1:2021].

metric1.name: Time Accuracy LE99.8
metric1.description: Time accuracy at 99,8 % significance level

evaluationRule.description: Half length of the interval defined by an upper and a lower limit, in which the true value for the time instance lies with probability 99.8 %; LE99.8 (ISO19157, Table D.67)

TemporalValidity.name: Temporal Validity
TemporalValidity.description: Validity of data with respect to time. [ISO 19157-1:2021].

Currentness.name: Currentness
Currentness.description: Degree to which data has attributes that are of the right age in a specific context of use [25012:2008].

metric1.name: Date Of Creation
metric1.description: Date of creation

evaluationRule.description: Date of creation should be included in user requested period
Date of publication should be included in user requested period

metric3.name: Date Of Revision
metric3.description: Date of revision declared in the Metadata

evaluationRule.description: Date of last revision should be included in user requested period

MaintenanceFrequency.name: Maintenance Frequency
MaintenanceFrequency.description: evaluation if a dataset is maintained as set as maintenance frequency [ISO 19157-3:2021].

metric2.name: MatchMaintenanceFreqRequested
metric2.description: Checks that the requested maintenance frequency by the user matches the declared maintenance frequency

evaluationRule.description: Should return true if matches user request of maintenance requency. Should be implemented when requests on dahsboard can be personnalized.

positionnalAccuracy.name: Positionnal Accuracy
positionnalAccuracy.description: Accuracy of the position of features [ISO 19157-1:2021].

AbsolutePositionalAccuracy.name: Absolute Positional Accuracy
AbsolutePositionalAccuracy.description: Closeness of reported coordinate values to values accepted as true in a standard coordinate reference system [ISO 19157-1:2021].

MeanValuePosUncertainties.name: MeanValuePosUncertainties
MeanValuePosUncertainties.description: Mean value of the positional uncertainties for a set of positions where the positional uncertainties are defined as the distance between a measured position and what is accepted as the corresponding true position [ISO 19157-3:2021].

metric1.name: MeanValuePosUncertainties
metric1.description: Mean value of positionnal uncertainty of the dataset

evaluationRule.description: Mean value of positionnal uncertainty should be between 0m and 0.8m (user request)
Check presence of lineage statement.

RelativePositionalAccuracy.name: Relative Positional Accuracy
RelativePositionalAccuracy.description: Closeness of the relative positions of features in the scope to their respective relative positions accepted as true in a local coordinate reference system [ISO 19157-1:2021].

RelativeVerticalError.name: Relative Vertical Error
RelativeVerticalError.description: evaluation of the random errors of one relief feature to another in the same dataset or on the same map/chart [ISO 19157-3:2021].

metric1.name: Relative Vertical Error
metric1.description: A comparison of the data (measured) and the control (true). Calculation method of the Relative LE (Rel LE90): see ISO19157-3, Table D.59

evaluationRule.description: The vertical relative error should be between x and x (user request)

RelativeHorizontalError.name: Relative Horizontal Error
RelativeHorizontalError.description: Evaluation of the random errors in the horizontal position of one feature to another in the same dataset or on the same map/chart [ISO 19157-3:2021].

metric1.name: RelativeHorizontalError
metric1.description: A comparison of the data (measured) and the control (true). Calculation method of the Relative LE (Rel CE90): see ISO19157-3, Table D.60

evaluationRule.description: The horizontal relative error should be between x and x (user request)

GriddedPositionalAccuracy.name: Gridded Positional Accuracy
GriddedPositionalAccuracy.description: Closeness of gridded data position values to values accepted as true [ISO 19157-1:2021].

CircularSD.name: Circular Standard Deviation
CircularSD.description: Circular standard deviation, also known as circular standard error, Helmerts point error, CSE [ISO 19157-3:2021].

metric1.name: Circular Standard Deviation
metric1.description: Radius describing a circle, in which the true point location lies with the probability of a normal distribution at 39,4 % (see ISO19157-3, Table D.49)

evaluationRule.description: The circular standard deviation should be between x and x (user request)

RMSErrorPlanimetry.name: RMS Error Planimetry
RMSErrorPlanimetry.description: Root mean square error of planimetry [ISO 19157-3:2021].

metric1.name: RMS Error Planimetry
metric1.description: Radius of a circle around the given point, in which the true value lies with probability P [ISO 19157-3:2021].s

evaluationRule.description: The circular standard deviation should be under 20m (user request)

equivalentScale.name: Equivalent Scale
equivalentScale.description: Level of detail expressed as the scale denominator of a comparable hardcopy map or chart [MD_IR_and_ISO_20081219].

metric1.name: Equivalent Scale
metric1.description: Level of detail expressed as the scale denominator of a comparable hardcopy map or chart. Each spatialResoultion element must contain either an equivalent scale or a distance but not both

evaluationRule.description: Map scale should be between 1/4900 and 1/5100 (user request).

metric1.name: Distance
metric1.description: Ground sample distance. Each 'spatialResoultion' element must contain either an equivalent scale or a distance but not both

evaluationRule.description: Distance should be between 15-20m (user request).

Interoperability.name: Interoperability
Interoperability.description: Viewpoint focused on the interoperability capacity of the dataset and service. Includes evaluations from the GeoE3 Data Maturity Model and Interoperability Map.

NationalData.name: National Data accessibility and integration arrangements
NationalData.description: National Data accessibility and integration arrangements

Reusability.name: Reusability
Reusability.description: Data and metadata are sufficiently annotated so machine and human users can determine fit-for-purpose in the context of their analysis (FAIR principles).

AccessRestrictions.name: Access Restrictions
AccessRestrictions.description: Checks whether the access to the data is public or restricted.

metric1.name: Public Access Restrictions
metric1.description: Access constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations on obtaining the resource.

evaluationRule.description: Assesses the accessibility based on restrictions and limitations on the resource.

metric2.name: Other Public Access Restrictions (other constraints)
metric2.description: Other restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource or metadata.

evaluationRule.description: Assesses the accessibility based on restrictions and limitations on the resource.

metric3.name: Conditions applying to access and use
metric3.description: Restrictions on the access and use of a resource or metadata.

evaluationRule.description: Assesses the accessibility based on restrictions and limitations on the resource.

PointOfContact.name: Point of Contact
PointOfContact.description: Checks whether the access to the data is public or restricted.

metric1.name: Contact's name
metric1.description: Checks whether contact's name is filled.

evaluationRule.description: Checks presence of contact's name.

metric2.name: Contact's email
metric2.description: Checks whether contact's email address is filled.

evaluationRule.description: Checks presence of contact's email address.
Checks presence of organisation name.

versioning.name: Versioning
versioning.description: Describes whether the versions of standards used is filled.

metric1.name: Metadata Standard Name
metric1.description: Metadata Standard Name is present.

evaluationRule.description: Checks presence of Metadata standard name.

metric1.name: Metadata Standard Version
metric1.description: Metadata Standard Version is present.

evaluationRule.description: Checks presence of Metadata standard version.

Traceability.name: Traceability
Traceability.description: Describes whether the data process is described adequately.

Traceability.name: Traceability
Traceability.description: Describes whether the data process is described adequately.

LineageStatment.name: Lineage Statment
LineageStatment.description: Describes whether the data has a lineage statment.

metric1.name: Lineage Statment
metric1.description: Describes whether the data has a lineage statment.

evaluationRule.description: Checks that lineage statement is present.

Interoperability.name: FAIR Interoperability
Interoperability.description: Data and metadata are consistently structured and described, both syntactically and semantically, so that algorithms can parse and ensure like data are accurately compared to like (FAIR principles).

ReferenceSystem.name: Reference System
ReferenceSystem.description: Description of the reference system(s) used in the data set.

CoordinateReferenceSystem.name: Coordinate Reference System
CoordinateReferenceSystem.description: Description of the coordinate reference system(s) used in the data set.

metric1.name: West Bound Longitude
metric1.description: Parameter must be set

evaluationRule.description: Checks that the property is set.
Checks that the property is set.
Checks that the property is set.
Checks that the property is set.

Format.name: Format
Format.description: Describes the file format of the distribution.

Format.name: Format
Format.description: Describes the file format of the distribution.

metric1.name: Format name
metric1.description: Describes the file format of the distribution.

evaluationRule.description: Checks that the property is set.

metric2.name: Format version
metric2.description: Describes the file format of the distribution.

evaluationRule.description: Checks that the property is set.

Encoding.name: Encoding
Encoding.description: Description of the computer language construct(s) specifying the representation of data objects in a record, file, message, storage device or transmission channel.

metric1.name: Character Encoding
metric1.description: The character encoding used in the data set.

evaluationRule.description: Checks that the property is set.

SpatialRepresentation.name: SpatialRepresentation
SpatialRepresentation.description: The method used to spatially represent geographic information.

metric1.name: Spatial representation type
metric1.description: Describes the spatial representation type.

evaluationRule.description: Checks that the property is set.
